Streams Hacker News data into Grafana dashboards

Related repos

  • Grafana: open source tool for dashboards, metrics, data visualization, and alerting from various sources
  • extracts and decrypts browser data for security research
  • RAG search for Hacker News posts using Ollama
  • news and discussion feed for developers, web app and browser extension
  • Extracts Reddit posts and analytics via Streamlit
  • Generate RSS feeds from Reddit, Hacker News, Lemmy, and more social sites for your favorite posts
  • web-based RSS reader you can run on your desktop or self-host

  • Extracts data from the dark web
